name: Pressroom Decisions
description:
This is my entry to the GP Jam 3 (my first game jam) "Pressroom Decisions".

YOU are the new employee at a printery  and have to decide which cards get sorted as Valentines-Cards ("You're the best", "I love you" etc.) and which are sad-cards ("My condolences", "I'm so sorry" etc.) and which are simply trash.

So you just have to drag and drop the right card in the right filing.

Have fun and try to keep your job!
